name: Tata Business Support Services Ltd
description:
India’s premium Business Process Management services provider, Tata Business Support Services is a wholly owned subsidiary of Tata Sons, the holding company of the 142 years old Tata Group – India’s most reputed brand.
Inspiring trust and un-complicating business transformations since 2004, Tata BSS is driven by the value of simplicity and serve companies that want to increase their customer base, retain high value customers, protect their brand reputation and become more efficient.
Tata BSS is among the Top BPO recruiters in India, promising their values, business ethics and Tata legacy.With state-of-the-art facilities across 19 delivery centers in 15 locations & powered by Over 11000 PILOTS (Preparing Innovative Leaders of Tomorrow), we provide customer service in Third Party Insurance Adminstration, Customer Lifecycle Management,Learning & Development, BI Analytics & Research, Digital Marketing Services & IT services for a growing community of 46+ industry leading customers spread across USA, Europe and Asia. Verticals served by Tata BSS includes, Telecom & Media,E-Commerce, others
